<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#FFFFFF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Key Highlights
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #E41F35;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:20PT;COLOR:#FF0000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Introduction
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This "Key Highlights" section provides a brief overview of Cardinal Health, Inc. and does not contain all of the information you should consider. Please read the entire Form 10-K carefully before voting or making an investment decision. As used in this report, &#8220;we,&#8221; &#8220;our,&#8221; &#8220;us&#8221; and similar pronouns refer to Cardinal Health, Inc. and its subsidiaries, unless the context requires otherwise.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	References to Fiscal Years
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our fiscal year ends on June 30.&#160; References to fiscal 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013 and 2012 and to FY16, FY15, FY14, FY13 and FY12 are to the fiscal years ended June 30, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013 and 2012, respectively. Except as otherwise specified, information in this Form 10-K is provided as of June 30, 2016.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-GAAP Financial Measures
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In this "Key Highlights" section and the "Fiscal 2016 Overview" section of Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations ("MD&amp;A"), we use financial measures that are derived from consolidated financial data but are not presented in our financial statements that are prepared in accordance with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles (&#8220;GAAP&#8221;). These measures are considered &#8220;non-GAAP financial measures&#8221; under the Securities and Exchange Commission (&#8220;SEC&#8221;) rules. The reasons we use these non-GAAP financial measures and the reconciliations to their most directly comparable GAAP financial measures are included in the &#8220;Explanation and Reconciliation of Non-GAAP Financial Measures&#8221; section following MD&amp;A in this Form 10-K.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Important Information Regarding Forward-Looking Statements
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This Form 10-K (including information incorporated by reference) includes forward-looking statements addressing expectations, prospects, estimates and other matters that are dependent upon future events or developments. Many forward-looking statements appear in MD&amp;A, but there are others throughout this document, which may be identified by words such as &#8220;expect,&#8221; &#8220;anticipate,&#8221; &#8220;intend,&#8221; &#8220;plan,&#8221; &#8220;believe,&#8221; &#8220;will,&#8221; &#8220;should,&#8221; &#8220;could,&#8221; &#8220;would,&#8221; &#8220;project,&#8221; &#8220;continue,&#8221; &#8220;likely,&#8221; and similar expressions, and include statements reflecting future results or guidance, statements of outlook and expense accruals. These matters are subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from those projected, anticipated or implied. The most significant of these risks and uncertainties are described in &#8220;Risk Factors&#8221; and in Exhibit 99.1 to this Form 10-K. Forward-looking statements in this document speak only as of the date of this document. Except to the extent required by applicable law, we undertake no obligation to update or revise any forward-looking statement.

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #E41F35;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	About Cardinal Health
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #E41F35;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='DISPLAY:INLINE-BLOCK; WIDTH:100%;'>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<A NAME="A16Q4_10KX63016XFORM10-K_HTM_S436BA3485E2B50ABB2E3C57952A30C84">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:20PT;COLOR:#FF0000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations (MD&amp;A)
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:20PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	About Cardinal Health
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;MARGIN-LEFT:AUTO;MARGIN-RIGHT:AUTO;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="1">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Cardinal Health, Inc. is an Ohio corporation formed in 1979 and is a global integrated healthcare services and products company providing customized solutions for hospital systems, pharmacies, ambulatory surgery centers, clinical laboratories and physician offices worldwide. We provide clinically proven medical products and pharmaceuticals and cost-effective solutions that enhance supply chain efficiency from hospital to home. We connect patients, providers, payers, pharmacists, and manufacturers for integrated care coordination and better patient management.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We manage our business and report our financial results in two segments: Pharmaceutical and Medical.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/08/12/0000721371-16-000277_A10KSEGMENTICONGRAPHICA03.JPG" STYLE="HEIGHT:127PX;WIDTH:672PX;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='DISPLAY:INLINE-BLOCK; WIDTH:100%;'>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:14PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Pharmaceutical Segment
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;MARGIN-LEFT:AUTO;MARGIN-RIGHT:AUTO;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our Pharmaceutical segment distributes branded and generic pharmaceutical, specialty pharmaceutical, over-the-counter healthcare and consumer products in the United States. This segment also operates nuclear pharmacies and cyclotron facilities, provides pharmacy management services to hospitals as well as medication therapy management and patient outcomes services to hospitals, other healthcare providers and payers, provides services to healthcare companies supporting the development, marketing, and distribution of specialty pharmaceutical products, and repackages generic pharmaceuticals and over-the-counter healthcare products. This segment also imports and distributes pharmaceuticals, over-the-counter healthcare and consumer products as well as provides specialty pharmacy and other services in China.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID='PAGEBREAK' STYLE='WIDTH:2%; FLOAT:LEFT;'>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:RIGHT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:14PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Medical Segment
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;MARGIN-LEFT:AUTO;MARGIN-RIGHT:AUTO;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our Medical segment distributes a broad range of medical, surgical and laboratory products and provides services to hospitals, ambulatory surgery centers, clinical laboratories and other healthcare providers in the United States, Canada and China. This segment distributes medical products to patients in the home in the United States. This segment also manufactures, sources and develops our&#160;own Cardinal Health brand medical and surgical products, which are sold in the United States, Canada, Europe and other regions internationally. This segment also provides post-acute care management and transition services and software to hospitals, other healthcare providers and payers.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-GAAP Financial Measures
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;MARGIN-LEFT:AUTO;MARGIN-RIGHT:AUTO;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="1">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We use "non-GAAP financial measures" as well as GAAP financial measures in the "Fiscal 2016 Overview" section. We include the reasons we use these non-GAAP financial measures and the reconciliations to their most directly comparable GAAP financial measures in the &#8220;Explanation and Reconciliation of Non-GAAP Financial Measures&#8221; section following MD&amp;A. The remaining sections of MD&amp;A refer to GAAP measures only.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>

</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">

</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:33%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:34%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:33%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Cardinal Health

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#EE2724;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

<DIV STYLE='DISPLAY:INLINE-BLOCK; WIDTH:100%;'>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Revenue
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Revenue for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$121.5 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	19 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;increase from the prior year, due primarily to sales growth from existing and new pharmaceutical distribution customers and from acquisitions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	The sum of the components may not equal the total due to rounding.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	During fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, GAAP operating earnings increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	14 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$2.5 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;and non-GAAP operating earnings increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	17 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$2.9 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	. The increases in both GAAP and non-GAAP operating earnings were due to sales growth from existing and new pharmaceutical distribution customers, performance under our Pharmaceutical segment generics program, and acquisitions, partially offset by the adverse impact of customer pricing changes. GAAP operating earnings were negatively impacted by increased acquisition-related amortization, partially offset by litigation recoveries.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

	&nbsp;

	The sum of the components may not equal the total due to rounding.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	During fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, GAAP diluted earnings per share attributable to Cardinal Health, Inc. ("diluted EPS") increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	20 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$4.32
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;and non-GAAP diluted EPS increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	20 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$5.24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	. GAAP and non-GAAP diluted EPS increased primarily due to the same factors impacting GAAP and non-GAAP operating earnings described above. The increase in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;GAAP diluted EPS also reflects the prior-year loss on extinguishment of debt.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Cash and Equivalents
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Our cash and equivalents balance was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$2.4 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$4.6 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	June&#160;30, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	. The decrease in cash and equivalents during the fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;was driven by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$3.6 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;deployed for acquisitions,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$512 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;paid in dividends,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$651 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;paid for share repurchases, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$465 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;in capital expenditures, partially offset by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$3.0 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;in cash provided by operating activities.

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="3">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:26%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:52%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:22%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #E41F35;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E41F35;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#FFFFFF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MD&amp;A
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #E41F35;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Results of Operations
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #E41F35;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:20PT;COLOR:#FF0000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Significant Developments in Fiscal 2016 and Trends
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Acquisitions
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="1">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='DISPLAY:INLINE-BLOCK; WIDTH:100%;'>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Cordis
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	On October&#160;2, 2015, we completed the acquisition of the Cordis business ("Cordis") from Ethicon, Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Johnson &amp; Johnson, for $1.9 billion using cash on hand and proceeds from our debt offering in June 2015. The acquisition of Cordis, a global manufacturer and distributor of interventional cardiology devices and endovascular solutions with operations in more than 50 countries, expands our Medical segment's portfolio of self-manufactured products and its geographic scope.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	naviHealth
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	On August 26, 2015, we acquired a 71 percent ownership interest in naviHealth Holdings, LLC ("naviHealth") for $238 million, net of cash acquired of $53 million. We funded the acquisition with cash on hand. The acquisition of naviHealth, a leader in post-acute care management solutions, expands our ability to help hospitals, other healthcare providers, and payers manage the complex processes of patient discharge. We consolidate the results of naviHealth in our consolidated financial statements and report its results in our Medical segment. The portion of naviHealth net earnings attributable to third-
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID='PAGEBREAK' STYLE='WIDTH:2%; FLOAT:LEFT;'>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:RIGHT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	party interest holders is reported as a reduction to net earnings in the consolidated statements of earnings. At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, our ownership interest in naviHealth was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	82 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;due to an additional capital contribution in connection with an acquisition by naviHealth. Refer to Note 12 for further information on this acquisition.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Harvard Drug
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	On
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	July 2, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, we completed the acquisition of The Harvard Drug Group ("Harvard Drug") for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$1.1 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;using cash on hand and proceeds from our debt offering in June 2015. The acquisition of Harvard Drug, a distributor of generic pharmaceuticals, over-the-counter healthcare and related products to retail, institutional, and alternate care customers, enhances our Pharmaceutical segment's generic pharmaceutical distribution and related services businesses. Harvard Drug also repackages generic pharmaceuticals and over-the-counter healthcare products.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Refer to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Note 2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;of the "Notes to Consolidated Financial Statements" for additional information on acquisitions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Trends
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='DISPLAY:INLINE-BLOCK; WIDTH:100%;'>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="1">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Within our Pharmaceutical segment, we expect segment profit for fiscal 2017 to be essentially flat compared to fiscal 2016. The factors contributing to our expectation include less profit growth from the segment&#8217;s generics program and the loss of a large pharmaceutical distribution customer beginning April 1, 2016, combined with the adverse impact of customer pricing changes similar to those in fiscal 2016. While we expect that the segment&#8217;s generics program will be positively impacted by benefits from both Red Oak Sourcing and new generic pharmaceutical launches, we expect that both of these items will have significantly less of a year-over-year positive segment profit
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID='PAGEBREAK' STYLE='WIDTH:2%; FLOAT:LEFT;'>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:RIGHT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-TOP:5PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	impact in fiscal 2017 than fiscal 2016. The impact of these factors will be more pronounced in the first quarter of fiscal 2017, when we expect Pharmaceutical segment profit to be significantly less than in the prior-year period and consolidated operating earnings to be less than in the prior-year period. However, as is generally the case, the frequency, magnitude and profit impact of future generic pharmaceutical product launches (as well as other factors impacting our generics program) are uncertain, and their impact on fiscal 2017 Pharmaceutical segment profit and consolidated operating earnings could be more or less than we expect.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Cardinal Health
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#EE2724;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

	Change

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Pharmaceutical Segment
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;Pharmaceutical segment revenue grew primarily due to sales growth from existing and new pharmaceutical distribution customers, including continued branded pharmaceutical price appreciation, all of which increased revenue by $16.9 billion. Acquisitions also contributed $2.1 billion to revenue growth.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Medical Segment
</FONT>
</DIV>

	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;Medical segment revenue grew primarily due to acquisitions, net of divestitures, which contributed $645 million, and sales growth from existing businesses.
</FONT>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;MARGIN-LEFT:AUTO;MARGIN-RIGHT:AUTO;WIDTH:99.89806320081549%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">

<TD COLSPAN="5" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Pharmaceutical Segment
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Pharmaceutical segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	revenue grew primarily due to sales growth from existing and new pharmaceutical distribution customers, which increased revenue by $13.7 billion. The growth was primarily driven by increased sales to existing customers, including continued branded pharmaceutical price appreciation and newly launched hepatitis C pharmaceutical products. The increase was partially offset by $3.3 billion due to the Walgreens contract expiration in the prior-year period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Medical Segment
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;Medical segment revenue grew primarily due to acquisitions which contributed $344 million.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Cost of Products Sold
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="1">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As a result of the same factors affecting the change in revenue, consolidated cost of products sold increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$18.2 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	19 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	) and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$10.9 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	) during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, respectively. See the gross margin discussion for additional drivers impacting cost of products sold.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='DISPLAY:INLINE-BLOCK; WIDTH:100%;'>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:99.89806320081549%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;consolidated gross margin increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$831 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	15 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	), and was favorably impacted by sales growth from existing and new pharmaceutical distribution customers ($510 million) and acquisitions, net of divestitures ($576 million).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Gross margin rate contracted during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, primarily due to changes in product mix driven by the on-boarding of a new mail order customer starting in October 2015, and also due to the adverse impact of customer pricing changes. Our gross margin rate was favorably impacted by performance under our Pharmaceutical segment generics program. Our generics program had strong year-over-year performance from Red Oak Sourcing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID='PAGEBREAK' STYLE='WIDTH:2%; FLOAT:LEFT;'>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:RIGHT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;Compared to Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:99.89806320081549%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;consolidated gross margin increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$551 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	11 percent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	), and was favorably
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	impacted by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	sales growth from existing and new pharmaceutical distribution customers, offset in part by the Walgreens contract expiration in the prior year. The net impact of these factors increased consolidated gross margin by $516 million. In addition, acquisitions favorably impacted gross margin by $101 million.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Gross margin rate contracted slightly during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, reflecting the adverse impact of customer pricing changes, the lower margin rate impact of newly launched hepatitis C pharmaceutical products, and new customer mix, largely offset by strong performance from our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Pharmaceutical segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	generics program, including benefits from Red Oak Sourcing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;Compared to Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2015
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:99.89806320081549%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">

<TD COLSPAN="5" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Pharmaceutical Segment Profit
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;Pharmaceutical segment profit increased due to sales growth from existing and new pharmaceutical distribution customers and performance under our generics program, partially offset by the adverse impact of customer pricing changes. Acquisitions also contributed to Pharmaceutical segment profit growth. Our generics program benefited from strong year-over-year performance from Red Oak Sourcing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Medical Segment Profit
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;Medical segment profit increased due to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	contribution from Cardinal Health Brand products. Acquisitions,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	net of divestitures, which included the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	unfavorable impact on cost of products sold from the fair value step up of inventory acquired with Cordis, also contributed to segment profit growth. Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;Medical segment profit growth was partially offset by a decline in the results from our Canada business.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Corporate
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	As discussed further in sections that follow, the principal driver for the change in Corporate during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;were increased amortization and other acquisition-related costs primarily related to the acquisitions of Cordis and Harvard Drug, partially offset by litigation recoveries.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID='PAGEBREAK' STYLE='WIDTH:2%; FLOAT:LEFT;'>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:RIGHT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fiscal

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2015

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;Compared to Fiscal

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:99.89806320081549%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Pharmaceutical Segment Profit
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;Pharmaceutical segment profit increased due to sales growth from existing and new pharmaceutical distribution customers and strong performance from our generics program, including benefits from Red Oak Sourcing, partially offset by the adverse impact of customer pricing changes and the Walgreens contract expiration in the prior-year period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Medical Segment Profit
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;Medical segment profit decreased primarily due to a decline in contribution from distribution of national brand products. This was partially offset by contributions from the strategic expansion of our portfolio of Cardinal Health Brand products and services, driven by acquisitions and targeted cost reductions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Corporate
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As discussed further in sections that follow, the principal driver for the change in Corporate in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;were increased amortization and other acquisition-related costs primarily due to costs incurred in connection with the acquisition of Cordis.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In addition to revenue, gross margin, and SG&amp;A expenses discussed previously, consolidated operating earnings were impacted by the following:
</FONT>
</DIV>

</EFX_INCOME_STATEMENT>
<DIV STYLE='DISPLAY:INLINE-BLOCK; WIDTH:100%;'>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Amortization and Other Acquisition-Related Costs
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Amortization of acquisition-related intangible assets was $355 million, $189 million and $187 million for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, respectively. The increase in amortization of acquisition-related intangible assets during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;was largely due to the Cordis and Harvard Drug acquisitions. Transaction and integration costs associated with the Cordis acquisition were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$78 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$44 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID='PAGEBREAK' STYLE='WIDTH:2%; FLOAT:LEFT;'>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:RIGHT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Litigation (Recoveries)/Charges, Net
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	During fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, we received and recognized income of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$80 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$71 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, respectively, from settlements of class action antitrust lawsuits in which we were a class member.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	During fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, we incurred litigation charges of $68 million related to government investigations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	2014

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</DIV>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">

</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The provision for income taxes increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$90 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;due to an increase in earnings from continuing operations before income taxes. Our effective tax rate decreased 1.3 percentage points during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Generally, fluctuations in the effective tax rate are due to changes in the distribution of income among non-U.S. taxing jurisdictions with lower income tax rates and discrete items. A reconciliation of the provision based on the federal statutory income tax rate to our effective income tax rate from continuing operations is as follows (see
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Note 7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of the "Notes to Consolidated Financial Statements" for additional information):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<DIV STYLE='DISPLAY:INLINE-BLOCK; WIDTH:100%;'>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:99.89806320081549%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The fiscal 2016 effective income tax rate was favorably impacted by the state and local income tax rate, which decreased 2.6 percentage points due to resolutions with state taxing authorities and a shift in the distribution of income among jurisdictions. The foreign tax rate differential decreased 1.8 percentage points primarily due to the deferred tax benefits recognized in fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Ongoing Audits
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The IRS is currently conducting audits of fiscal years 2006 through 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID='PAGEBREAK' STYLE='WIDTH:2%; FLOAT:LEFT;'>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:RIGHT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;and Fiscal 2014
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:99.89806320081549%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:20%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="5" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;effective income tax rate was unfavorably impacted by the state and local income tax rate, which increased 1.9 percentage points due to the de-recognition of certain state tax benefits. The foreign tax rate differential also increased 1.2 percentage points primarily due to recognition of deferred tax benefits resulting from new tax legislation. In addition, the change in measurement of uncertain tax positions increased 1.3 percentage points primarily as a result of proposed assessment of additional tax.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;effective tax rate was impacted by net favorable discrete items of $37 million, which reduced the rate by 2.1 percentage points. The discrete items include the favorable impact of the settlement of federal and state tax controversies ($80 million) and release of valuation allowances ($12 million) and the unfavorable impact of remeasurement of unrecognized tax benefits ($65 million), primarily as a result of proposed assessments of additional tax.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<EFX_LIQUIDITY_CAPITAL>
<A NAME="FIS_LIQUIDITY_CAPITAL"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:99.40944881889764%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="3">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:26%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:52%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:22%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #E41F35;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E41F35;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#FFFFFF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MD&amp;A
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #E41F35;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Liquidity and Capital Resources
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #E41F35;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:20PT;COLOR:#FF0000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Liquidity and Capital Resources
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	We currently believe that, based on available capital resources (cash on hand and committed credit facilities) and projected operating cash flow, we have adequate capital resources to fund working capital needs; currently anticipated capital expenditures; currently anticipated business growth and expansion; contractual obligations; tax payments; and current and projected debt service requirements, dividends, and share repurchases. If we decide to engage in one or more additional acquisitions, depending on the size and timing of such transactions, we may need to access capital markets for additional financing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Cash and Equivalents
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="1">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;HEIGHT:5PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='DISPLAY:INLINE-BLOCK; WIDTH:100%;'>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our cash and equivalents balance was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.4 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$4.6 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The decrease in cash and equivalents during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was driven by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$3.6 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;deployed for acquisitions,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$512 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;paid in dividends,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$651 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;paid for share repurchases, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$465 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in capital expenditures, partially offset by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$3.0 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in cash provided by operating activities. Net cash provided by operating activities was positively impacted by increased net earnings and working capital improvements. At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, our cash and equivalents were held in cash depository accounts with major banks or invested in high quality, short-term liquid investments.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The cash and equivalents balance at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;included $475 million of cash held by subsidiaries outside of the United States. Although the vast majority of cash is available for repatriation, bringing the cash into the United States could trigger U.S federal, state and local income tax obligations. Because the earnings are considered permanently reinvested, no U.S. tax provision has been accrued related to the repatriation of these earnings. It is not practicable to evaluate the amount of U.S. tax that might be payable on the eventual remittance of such earnings.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID='PAGEBREAK' STYLE='WIDTH:2%; FLOAT:LEFT;'>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE='FLOAT:RIGHT; WIDTH:49%;'>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, net cash provided by operating activities of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.5 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;was positively impacted by working capital improvements. These funds were deployed for&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.0 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of share repurchases,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$503 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of acquisitions and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$460 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of cash dividends.&#160;In addition, during the second quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, we refinanced $1.2 billion of long-term debt at lower interest rates and longer maturities and during the fourth quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;we received proceeds from the issuance of additional long-term debt of $1.5 billion to fund the Harvard Drug and Cordis acquisitions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;we deployed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$673 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of cash on share repurchases,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$519 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;on acquisitions and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$415 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;on dividends. Net cash provided by operating activities of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.5 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;benefited from a net working capital decrease in excess of $500 million as a result of the Walgreens contract expiration.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Changes in working capital, which impact operating cash flow, can vary significantly depending on factors such as the timing of customer payments, inventory purchases and payments to vendors in the regular course of business, as well as fluctuating working capital needs driven by customer and product mix.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:16PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Financing Arrangements and Financial Instruments
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
</TD>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #EE2724;">
